name: Don't Melt (codercody, Fred1)
description:
Immerse yourself in the life of a snowman, on a mission to find and deliver presents! Jump into the fire (or don't), and see if you have what it takes to avoid liquidation!

This game was created for the Newbies Jam Winter Special by the Bros Game Development Team,  Fred1, and myself. We have been learning game development in Unity for a few weeks and created all the assets and sound for this game.
